participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, Emily loves the outdoors and enjoys spending time with her horses.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. i like to listen to rock music while working. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: David Thompson
participant_2.personality: Determined and disciplined, David is focused on his career and values family time highly.
participant_2.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing. i am married to a doctor.

content.text: my family is a farmer , my dad is a farmer .
